question:
Write all possible products of the base-catalyzed crossed aldol reactions between each pair of reaction partners given below. (Hint: Multiple products are possible in every case; be sure to include thermodynamically unfavorable as well as favorable ones.)
(a) Butanal and acetaldehyde
(b) 2,2-Dimethylpropanal and acetophenone 
(c) Benzaldehyde and 2-butanone
